text: Oh! Mother Russia is a compilation album by the Spanish rock band Dover. It was released in Japan on 23 November 2005 under a German-Japanese independent record label, Solitary Man Records. This collection spans 4 years of songs from the albums Late at Night (1999), I Was Dead for 7 Weeks in the City of Angels (2001) and The Flame (2003). == Track listing == == Personnel == Dover * Cristina Llanos – vocals and guitar * Amparo Llanos – guitar * Jesús Antúnez – drums * Álvaro Díez – bass guitar == References == == External links == * Category:2005 compilation albums Category:Dover (band) compilation albums
title: Oh! Mother Russia
